comments.body: do you need setuptools at runtime

It's a dependency of xarray
https://github.com/pydata/xarray/blob/b9e6a36ff7a0ca3593165cf191f4152666fa4a66/setup.cfg#L79
we had problems being resolved properly with in the past, why we explilitly added to our setup.py .
https://github.com/glotaran/pyglotaran/issues/354
Since the xarray-feedstock isn't setting the minimum version, I'm not sure if we might get that problem again.
https://github.com/conda-forge/xarray-feedstock/blob/1cf08c9f60afb05d91f0f2cafc0ea664bf136e0e/recipe/meta.yaml#L26
